resources.string: Developer Student Club GMRIT is inspired by Google Developers Family. We started our journey in August 2020. We try to engage student developers through our hack events, codelabs and meetups. The motive is to create a local ecosystem of programmers and hackers in and around the Campus. The technology awareness is main goal for first few years of the group.
The clubs are intended as a space for students to try out new ideas and collaborate to solve mobile and web development problems.

DSC, GMR Institute of Technology | DSC, GMRIT is a realm for students who are interested in Google Developer Technologies. We provide an opportunity to showcase your skills, grow knowledge in a better learning environment. With a Perfect Blend of Professionalism, we act as a catalyst to bring the required change in the Society.
